bio.line1: I'm Santtu Nykänen, a thirty-something fullstack-developer from Helsinki.
bio.line2: I switched careers about four years ago and have been working as a developer for just over two years now. Along with work I study Software Development at Haaga-Helia University.
bio.line3: At work I've mostly coded Python, Java and JavaScript, in no particlar order. Lately I've also been studying stuff like Go, Flutter and Kotlin.
bio.line4: This portfolio includes brief information about my personal projects, as well as links to my online profiles, such as LinkedIn and GitHub, which are likely to always have more accurate and up-to-date information. Thanks for visiting!

solidabis.title: Solidabis Oy
solidabis.description: Software development as a consultant on various client projects in both backend and frontend roles. Started in March 2019.

varastolista.title: Säteilytekniikan varastolista
varastolista.description: An inventory app I created as a student for my friend's department at the Helsinki University Hospital. It's a fairly simple CRUD app that enables the user to find, add, edit, or delete spare parts. The parts list can also be imported or exported as an Excel file. A QR-code reader functionality that uses your phone camera can be used input part numbers.

monitorimittari.title: Monitorimittari
monitorimittari.description: Another program made for the Helsinki University Hospital. This one is a Python-based GUI-program for logging test results with an LXscan spot luminance meter and saving them onto an .xlsx template.

dopepod.title: dopepod
dopepod.description: A web app that catalogues podcasts with the help of the iTunes API (and scrapes additional information from other sources). A user is able to listen to hundreds of thousands of free podcasts. A registered user is also able to subscribe to podcasts and to create a playlist.

dop3pod.title: dop3pod
dop3pod.description: Version 3.0 of my above-mentioned pet project. Aims to recreate similar functionality using more modern technologies and a more advanced architecture. The most prominent additions to the project are a Go backend and an Android/iOS app developed with Flutter.

noteowl.title: NoteOwl
noteowl.description: A web app that's used for writing down notes and associating them with dates on a calendar. Uses React on the frontend and Node on the backend. The database is a MongoDB.

tradenomi.title: Bachelor of Business Administration
tradenomi.description: Bachelor's degree in Business Information Technology at Haaga-Helia University, majoring in Software Development. Started in 2018, ongoing.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Open 2021
fullstack.description: An open online course on fullstack development by the University of Helsinki. Completed in 2021.

elements.title: Elements of AI
elements.description: An open online course on the basics of AI by the University of Helsinki. Completed in 2019.

java.title: Ohjelmoinnin perusteet ja jatkokurssi 2017
java.description: An open online course on Java development by the University of Helsinki consisting of introductory and advanced parts. Completed in 2017.

cs50x.title: CS50X
cs50x.description: An open online course on computer science by Harvard University. Singularly responsible for initially making me want to study coding. Completed in 2017.
